mapper.select: select level_name from t_xyjf_score_level where #{score}<=max_score and #{score}>=min_score
mapper.insert: insert into t_xyjf_score_level (id, level_name, min_score, max_score, icon) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_xyjf_score_level
id,
level_name,
min_score,
max_score,
icon,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{minScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{maxScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_xyjf_score_level
level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_score = #{minScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_score = #{maxScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
